briefTitle: A Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Testosterone Gel in Adult Hypogonadal Males
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Open-Label, Non-Randomized, Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of FE 999303 (Testosterone Gel) in Adult Hypogonadal Males
summary: This is a phase 3, open-label, non-randomized, clinical trial to evaluate the efficacy and safety of FE 999303 (Testosterone gel) in adult hypogonadal males.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Percentage of Subjects Whose Average Concentration (Cave(0-24)) Serum Total Testosterone Levels Are ≥300 and ≤1050 ng/dL
